title: Allan Ramsay,
author: Smeaton, William Henry Oliphant
snippet: But at length, induced by their advice, he threw himself into the undertaking with enthusiasm. In a letter to his kinsman William Ramsay of Templehall, dated April 8, 1724, he writes : " I am this vacation going through with a Dramatick Pastoral, whilk I design to carry the length of
